```{r}
clinic_points = st_read("/Users/shivyucel/Documents/projects.nosync/opioid_accessibility/opioid_accessibility/data/toronto_data/clinics_for_routing/clinics_for_routing_v2.csv")

clinic_points$lon <- as.numeric(as.character(clinic_points$lon))
clinic_points$lat <- as.numeric(as.character(clinic_points$lat))


```



```{r}
# set inputs
mode <- c("WALK", "TRANSIT", "WALK")
max_walk_dist <- 10000
max_trip_duration <- 120
departure_time<- as.POSIXct("19-06-2019 8:00:00", format = "%d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S")

# calculate a travel time matrix
ttm0900_2 <- travel_time_matrix(r5r_core = r5r_core,
                          origins = DA_centroids,
                          destinations = clinic_points,
                          departure_datetime = departure_time,
                          mode = mode,
                          max_rides = 10,
                          max_walk_dist = max_walk_dist,
                          max_trip_duration = max_trip_duration,
                          time_window = 60,
                          verbose = FALSE)


```



```{r}
cens = st_write(ttm0900, "/Users/shivyucel/Documents/projects.nosync/opioid_accessibility/opioid_accessibility/data/toronto_data/2019_region_routing/data/travel_times/19_06_2019_0900_2.csv")

```
